rationale: 'worries me' describes a reaction. 'durable individual immunity' is not a risk-adjective.
statement_text: What worries me is if we donâ€™t have durable individual immunity, which I think you only get from a vaccine. And by durable [immunity] I mean you do not have to have an encounter with a health care system every six months. So I still think that a vaccine is the Holy Grail.
